snippet.title: DreadStar: The Quest for Revenge - Steam trailer
snippet.description:
Released Oct. 20th on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/710220/DreadStar_The_Quest_for_Revenge/

DreadStar: The Quest for Revenge is a retro-styled top-down shooter with RPG elements that sets you on a journey to avenge your father. Leveling up your ship, upgrading its equipment and getting new skill points will help you defeat your enemies in 6 replayable levels.
